import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"Listar dominios personalizados"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/deployments/{deployment_name}/custom_domains"} context={"endpoint"} />

Obtiene todos los dominios personalizados configurados para un despliegue.

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"Solicitud"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"deployment_name","in":"path","description":"Nombre del despliegue","required":true}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"Cuerpo"} body={undefined} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["domains"],"properties":{"domains":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["creationTime","deploymentName","requestDestination","domain"],"properties":{"creationTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Marca temporal en milisegundos cuando se creó este dominio."},"deploymentName":{"type":"string","description":"Nombre del despliegue para el que se configuró este dominio."},"domain":{"type":"string","description":"El nombre de dominio personalizado."},"requestDestination":{"description":"El destino de este dominio personalizado (convexCloud o convexSite).","type":"string","enum":["convexCloud","convexSite"],"title":"RequestDestination"},"verificationTime":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","description":"Marca temporal en milisegundos cuando se verificó este dominio, o null si aún\nno se ha verificado."}},"title":"PlatformCustomDomainResponse"},"description":"Lista de dominios personalizados configurados para este despliegue."}},"title":"PlatformListCustomDomainsResponse"}}}}}} />
